verses.verse: <S%H3467>Help,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for the godly <S%H2623>man<s%> <S%H1584>ceases.<s%> For the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>fail<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H376>Everyone<s%> <S%H7723>lies<s%> <S%H1696>to<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> They <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and with a <S%H3820>double<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
who have <S%H559>said,<s%> "With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> we will <S%H1396>prevail.<s%> Our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our <S%H113>own.<s%> Who is lord over us?"

"Because of the <S%H7701>oppression<s%> of the <S%H6041>weak<s%> and because of the <S%H603>groaning<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> I will now <S%H6965>arise,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in <S%H3468>safety<s%> from those who malign <S%H6315>him.<s%>"

The <S%H565>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> are <S%H2889>flawless<s%> <S%H565>words,<s%> as <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>refined<s%> in a <S%H776>clay<s%> <S%H5948>furnace,<s%> <S%H2212>purified<s%> seven <S%H7659>times.<s%>
You will <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> Yahweh. You will <S%H5341>preserve<s%> them from <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> when what is <S%H2149>vile<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the sons of <S%H1121>men.<s%>
